name: Ding Dong XL
description: Ding Dong XL is a neon-infused one button arcade game. It is an addictive 'just-one-more-round' score chaser, perfect for playing while waiting in queue for another game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB+ Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Ding Dong XL should technically run on a Windows XP machine, that doesn't mean you should do it though. But if you do it and it works, AWESOME!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 42 GB RAM Storage: 501 MB available space Sound Card: rhyming wasn't much liked, now I feel like a jerk, writing these is work. Additional Notes: You are all better than you think you are, you are just designed not to believe it when you hear it from yourself.
